attributes.additional_details: To extend the deadline would be fair to uk nationals living in Europe that find themselves in difficulties due to lockdown and the aftermath.
attributes.background: Extend the withdrawal agreement due to the coronavirus. Europe is in a critical wartime state and uk nationals will not be able to complete tasks in the time left in Europe. Give uk nationals the extra time as council office's are closed and movement is restricted

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300412

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
